column4: hello!  Anyone here familiar with an app to playback audio with foot pedal control?
MeRodent: you are trying to install ubuntu to a flash drive or from a flash drive?
from a flash drive. Trying to set the flash drive up so I can load ubuntu server onto my Revo when I get it.
do you want a flash drive like a live cd?
I setup my flash drive with unetbootin, ran it live and clicked the "install" icon
yes. I want to run the netbox as a server - 8.04LTS. Which I'll be able to do from the ISO as long as I can boot off the USB stick.
have you determined if you computer can boot from a USB stick? How old is it?
the Revo is an atom 1.6Ghz (processor) powered mini desktop.
I would suggest setting up your USB flash drive by using unetbooting - its so easy
just looking at the wiki now and it looks like what I'm after.
you can use the .iso you already downloaded
Just a shame that the ubunut help file misses out on such a small detail as to where to get the files.
not netbootin, the USB memory stick help files in the ubuntu docs.
thanks mate. looks like it's done the trick. :)
